Title: Dragonfly
Overview: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patient's near death experiences.
Tagline: When someone you love dies... are they gone forever?
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Spyglass Entertainment, Shady Acres Entertainment, Gran Via Productions, Kalima Productions GmbH & Co. KG, NDE Productions
Cast: Kevin Costner, Joe Morton, Ron Rifkin
